resources.string: FbShare
LOGIN WITH FACEBOOK
Create New Group And Invite Your FB Friends
Join a new group created by your FB Friends
View groups you have joined and start sharing
LOGOUT FROM APP
Do you wish to announce on Facebook that you have begun using this App?
(Doing so is optional, but recommended, since friends on Facebook will be notified on their news feed that you are using this App, and so will be able to share with you)
Group name selected already exists. Please use another group name.
MESSAGE FRIENDS INVITING THEM TO NEW GROUP
NAAH... THEY\'LL JOIN WHENEVER THEY WANT TO
The following are the Group Details:
Do you want to join this group?
The following groups have been created by your friends; Please click on the group you want to join.
INFORM YOUR FB FRIENDS ABOUT JOINING GROUP
NAAH... THEY\'LL GET TO KNOW EVENTUALLY
You are a member of the following groups; Please click on any group to start sharing.
Share a file from device with group members
Share a PDF file from your device with the Group
Share a DOCX file from your device with the Group
Share an Image file from your device with the Group
Share an Audio file from your device with the Group
Share a Video file from your device with the Group
Upload selected files
Share on Facebook
View all messages shared on this group
Press Continue share another post or Exit to go to the main screen
SHARE AN OUTSIDE LINK WITH GROUP MEMBERS
